svcproc.title: Service procedure

warning.para: To avoid personal injury or death, shift transmission to neutral or park, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.

note.para: In the event that Huck fasteners are removed, in order to maintain the same joint integrity, International requires that new Huck fasteners be used for attachment/reattachment of components, unless instructed otherwise by International service documentation.

svcproc.para: Alcoa Fastening Systems offers a special promotional price on the HUCK 940 Repair Kit which makes replacing the Huck frame fasteners fast and simple. Click here to learn moreor contact Gerry.Sorvino@alcoa.com for additional details.

Huck spin fasteners are used in many locations on International Trucks and IC buses. When servicing an area that has a Huck fastener from the factory, International requires that only Huck fasteners of the same size and grade be re-installed, unless instructed otherwise by International service documentation. Dealers are encouraged to purchase Huck equipment or utilize a local Huck service provider.
